meanings.definition: In a manner that is extremely unpleasant or shocking.
meanings.sent1: The horror movie was horrendously scary.
meanings.sent2: The storm outside was horrendously loud.
meanings.sent4: The news of the accident spread horrendously fast.
meanings.sent5: The haunted house was decorated horrendously well.

meanings.definition: To a very great extent or degree.
meanings.sent1: She worked horrendously hard to finish the project on time.
meanings.sent2: The team played horrendously well in the championship game.
meanings.sent3: The chef seasoned the dish horrendously, making it too salty.
meanings.sent4: The flowers in the garden bloomed horrendously, painting the landscape in vibrant colors.
meanings.sent5: The music festival attracted a horrendously large crowd.
